features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Dryride two-layer fabric [10,000mm/5,000g] is highly breathable, waterproof, and quick-drying; Critically-taped seams lock out the elements; PFC-free DWR coating
Thermacore insulation [180g] for focused warmth and enhanced breathability; Taffeta lining mapped with sherpa fleece back panel and collar for additional warmth
Removable Contour hood with elastic hood gaiter; Chafe-free chin guard
Adjustable cuffs; Reflective details; Ticket O-ring
Room-to-Grow system extends the length of the sleeves by 1. 5in to keep up with growth spurts
Sleeve pass pocket with hook-and-loop closure and zippered microfleece hand-warmer pockets
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
